author: rdonkin
msg: New rule which creates a DOM node from part of the XML tree and pushes it onto the stack. Submitted by Christopher Lenz.

author: rdonkin
msg: This is an important change but is backward compatible. This changes the basic rule abstract class so that name and namespace information are be supplied to the rule. Existing rules that do not require this functionality can continue to use the old (deprecated) version. Submitted by Christopher Lenz.

author: rdonkin
msg: Fix for issue #12756. This enhances digester by support for call param rules which take their values from the stack. Patch submitted by John Yu.

author: rdonkin
msg: Fix for bug #11693: CallMethod rule on nested indentical elements cause parameter confusion. Submitted by Emmanuel Bourg.
